description: It should be something we do whenever and wherever we get the chance. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Friendship: It doesn’t have to be complicated
title_page: Friendship: It doesn’t have to be complicated | The Straits Times
maintext:
Cuddly Winnie the Pooh and edgy K-pop sensation BTS belong to very different worlds, but they have something in common – they hold the torch of friendship. I discovered this ahead of the International Day of Friendship on July 30.
The United Nations proclaimed the International Day of Friendship in 2011 to build bridges and peace.
